abstract.para: This manual documents the interfaces of the libgpod library and has some short notes to help get you up to speed with using the library.

Please see the programs in the tests/ directory of the source distribution for some usage examples. A more complete example can be found in the source for Gtkpod. You can also ask questions on the developer's mailing list: gtkpod-devel@lists.sourceforge.net.

partintro.para: The iPod database functions are used for adding audio and video to the iPod.
The Photo database functions are used for adding pictures to the iPod.
